articles.author: Julia Alexander
articles.title: LG used a virtual influencer to announce new products during its CES keynote - The Verge
articles.description: CES is a place for robots and inventions, so it shouldn’t be too surprising that LG used a virtual influencer — Reah Keem — to introduce one of its new robots. Keem’s appearance also hammered home just how socially distant and virtual this CES is.
articles.content:
Meet Reah Keem, a DJ and travel aficionado
Reah Keem is just like you and I she loves working on music, vacationing abroad, and is pretty bummed out about not being able to visit any cool places rig… [+1876 chars]
